meanings.definition: A woman who gives money or help to a person or organization.
meanings.sent1: The kind benefactresses donated money to the local shelter.
meanings.sent2: The benefactresses generously supported the community center.
meanings.sent3: The benefactresses made sure to help those in need with their donations.
meanings.sent4: The benefactresses were like guardian angels, offering assistance to those in distress.
meanings.sent5: The image of the benefactresses handing out food to the homeless stayed with me.

meanings.definition: Women who perform acts of kindness or charity.
meanings.sent1: The group of benefactresses organized a charity event for the orphanage.
meanings.sent2: Many benefactresses volunteered at the local hospital to help patients.
meanings.sent3: The benefactresses' kind deeds brought smiles to many faces.
meanings.sent4: In times of trouble, the benefactresses were like beacons of hope.
meanings.sent5: The community recognized the benefactresses for their selfless acts of kindness.
